<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return leader of the formation.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Object]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''formationLeader''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>? (formationLeader player != leader player) :
 hint "Formation leader is not the group leader."</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[commandFollow]], [[doFollow]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[leader]], [[selectLeader]], [[setLeader]]
</value></part></template>
